name: Climbing
description: Grants advantage on climbing checks and movement on vertical surfaces.

name: Growth
description: Temporarily grow larger.

name: Shrink
description: Temporarily shrink smaller.

name: Fortify Stat
description: Increase %s by %c for a duration.

name: Drain Stat
description: Decrease %s by %c for a duration.

name: Fortify Health
description: Increase maximum health by %c.

name: Drain Health
description: Decrease maximum health by %c.

name: Fortify Magic
description: Increase maximum mana or magical energy by %c.

name: Drain Magic
description: Decrease maximum mana or magical energy by %c.

name: Speed
description: Gain the skill Speed %c.

name: Resistance
description: Gain resistance to %e.

name: Frailty
description: Gain a weakness to %e.

name: Paralysis
description: Immobilize a target, tagret rolls constitution -%c to resist paralysis.

name: Quick Poison
description: Take %c damage every attack round due to poison.

name: Slow Poison
description: Take %c damage every hour due to slow-acting poison.

name: Quick Mana Poison
description: Lose %c mana every attack round due to magical poison.

name: Slow Mana Poison
description: Lose %c mana every hour due to slow-acting magical poison.

name: Water Breathing
description: Breathe underwater without penalty.

name: Invisibility
description: Become invisible, avoiding detection. Invisibility is at level %c.

name: Breath Weapon
description: Exhale a %e elemental attack, such as fire or ice.

name: Flight
description: Fly at the same speed as running on the ground.

name: Luck
description: Gain a percentage-based bonus to luck-related rolls.

name: Iron Skin
description: Reduce armor class by %c, making you harder to hit.

name: Frail Skin
description: Increase armor class by %c, making you easier to hit.

name: Strength
description: Reduce THAC0 by %c, improving attack chances.

name: Weakness
description: Increase THAC0 by %c, reducing attack chances.
